column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Service: Now - here's where I got a bit iffy. Our waitress was really nice and helpful
column2: and her service was great. But
column3: when we were served our ramen
column4: the lady who served it to us had her THUMB inside our bowl. This is very unprofessional. If you are not able to handle the bowl alone
column5: the protocol is to place a plate under the bowl & and carry the plate instead. This was huge issue for me. I hope they see this & realize it needs to be changed because you can't put your thumb where people eat.
